name: Compact Blaze
desc: When an ally target is attacked, "Blazar" DMG multiplier increases by 20% of the original multiplier, stacking up to 2 time(s) and lasting for 2 turn(s).
enhanced_desc: When an ally target is attacked, "Blazar" DMG multiplier increases by 30% of the original multiplier, stacking up to 2 time(s) and lasting for 2 turn(s).
